plot: A professional football coach demonstrates the moves and training needed in order to produce the fancy footwork needed to avoid opposing players in a broken-field run.
title: Football Footwork
plot_es: A professional football coach demonstrates the moves and training needed in order to produce the fancy footwork needed to avoid opposing players in a broken-field run.
plot_en: A professional football coach demonstrates the moves and training needed in order to produce the fancy footwork needed to avoid opposing players in a broken-field run.
